sourcesContent:
My Calcs

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CalcLine } from '../calc-line'; import { CalcLineService } from '../calc-line.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-calcs-list', templateUrl: './calcs-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./calcs-list.component.css'] }) export class CalcsListComponent { constructor(private calcLineService: CalcLineService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getLines(); } getLines(): void { this.lines = this.calcLineService.getAll(); } selectedLine? : CalcLine; onSelect(line: CalcLine): void { this.selectedLine = line; } lines: CalcLine[] = []; }
